My 2020 OKRs

January 14, 2020 • 1 min read • okrs

I learned about OKRs in 2019, and since then have come to appreciate them. They’re simple: come up with one high-level Objective you’d like to accomplish, then come up with separate, measurable Key Results that indicate whether you’ve hit your objective or not.

About Me

My name is Huanju. I'm a software developer specializing in Java, Python and AWS. I have a website that I developed independently using React and JavaScript. I like new technologies and have experience in solving problems in real-world scenarios.
